about_the_game:
This is the demo of upcoming horror game CONTORTED
(You can find the demo on itch.io! For some reason the download demo button doesn't work and im trying to fix it ASAP....)



With your camera you can use to create light sources in the world and to defend yourself from creatures



New and fresh environments everytime you decend down a well

FEATURES
- 100% Original soundtrack to create a specific kind of eerie and creepy atmosphere
- Beautiful graphics powered by Unreal Engine
- 1 Hour of playtime with no time wasted
- Gameplay that increases tension and fear

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains loud sounds and flashing lights. 
Fear and frightening scenes.
This game doesnt contain depictions of violence or sexual content.

detailed_description:
This is the demo of upcoming horror game CONTORTED
(You can find the demo on itch.io! For some reason the download demo button doesn't work and im trying to fix it ASAP....)



With your camera you can use to create light sources in the world and to defend yourself from creatures



New and fresh environments everytime you decend down a well

FEATURES
- 100% Original soundtrack to create a specific kind of eerie and creepy atmosphere
- Beautiful graphics powered by Unreal Engine

name: CONTORTED Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10-11
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 470 / GTX 1050 ti
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10-11
  • Processor: Ryzen 5600X / Intel Core i5-11600K
  • Graphics: RTX 3060 / AMD RX 6600 XT
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: CONTORTED is a exploration horror game, where you decend down seemingly endless amount of mysterious wells to find someone, only to find out you're neither alone or safe
